title: Prohibited uses of campaign funds
context: [ยง11-382] Prohibited uses of campaign funds. Campaign funds shall not be used: (1) To support the campaigns of candidates other than the candidate with which they are directly associated; (2) To campaign against any other candidate not directly opposing the candidate with which they are directly associated; or (3) For personal expenses. [L 2010, c 211, pt of ยง2]
